languages.text: "Ты больше не отсидишься за чужими спинами. Я отправлю тебя на арену, когда прислужник гемункула явится за гладиаторами".
"No longer will you hide behind the backs of others. When the Haemonculus's servant comes to collect the gladiators, I shall be sending you to the arena.."
languages.original_text: "Ты больше не отсидишься за чужими спинами. Я отправлю тебя на арену, когда прислужник гемункула явится за гладиаторами".

traits.locale_text: "No more will you hide behind others' backs. I am sending you to the arena when the Haemonculus's servant comes to collect gladiators."
"No more will you hide behind others' backs. I am sending you to the arena when the Haemonculus's servant comes to collect gladiators."
"No more will you hide behind others' backs. I am sending you to the arena when the Haemonculus's servant comes to collect gladiators."
"No more will you hide behind others' backs. I am sending you to the arena when the Haemonculus's servant comes to collect gladiators."
"No longer will you hide behind the backs of others. When the Haemonculus's servant comes to collect the gladiators, I shall be sending you to the arena.."
"No longer will you hide behind the backs of others. When the Haemonculus's servant comes to collect the gladiators, I shall be sending you to the arena.."

languages.text: 「もう他人の陰に隠れることはない。ハモンキュラスの従者が剣闘士を集めにやってくるとき、お前をアリーナに送るとしよう」
languages.original_text: "No longer will you hide behind the backs of others. When the Haemonculus's servant comes to collect the gladiators, I shall be sending you to the arena.."

traits.locale_text: 「もう他人の陰に隠れることはない。ハモンキュラスの従者が剣闘士を集めにやってくるとき、お前をアリーナに送るとしよう」

languages.text: “你不用再躲在别人身后了。等血伶人的仆人来召集角斗士的时候，我会亲自把你派到竞技场上。”
languages.original_text: "No longer will you hide behind the backs of others. When the Haemonculus's servant comes to collect the gladiators, I shall be sending you to the arena.."

traits.locale_text: “你不用再躲在别人身后了。等血伶人的仆人来召集角斗士的时候，我要把你派到竞技场上。”

languages.text: «No podrás esconderte más detrás de los otros. Cuando el sirviente del Hemónculo venga a por gladiadores, irás a la arena».
languages.original_text: "No longer will you hide behind the backs of others. When the Haemonculus's servant comes to collect the gladiators, I shall be sending you to the arena.."

traits.locale_text: «No podrás esconderte más. Te enviaré a la arena cuando el sirviente del Hemónculo venga a por gladiadores».

languages.text: "Ihr werdet Euch nicht mit hinter anderer Leute Rücken verstecken. Wenn der Diener des Haemonculus kommt, um die Gladiatoren zu sammeln, werde ich Euch in die Arena schicken."
languages.original_text: "No longer will you hide behind the backs of others. When the Haemonculus's servant comes to collect the gladiators, I shall be sending you to the arena.."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr versteckt Euch nicht länger hinter dem Rücken anderer. Ich schicke Euch in die Arena, wenn der Diener des Haemonculus kommt, um Gladiatoren zu sammeln."

languages.text: « Vous ne vous cacherez plus jamais derrière autrui. Je vous enverrai dans l'arène quand le serviteur de l'hémoncule viendra chercher des gladiateurs. »
languages.original_text: "No longer will you hide behind the backs of others. When the Haemonculus's servant comes to collect the gladiators, I shall be sending you to the arena.."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne vous cacherez plus jamais derrière les autres. Je vous enverrai dans l'arène quand le serviteur de l'hémoncule viendra chercher de nouveaux gladiateurs. »

languages.text: "Artık başkalarının arkasına saklanamayacaksın. Haimonkulus'un hizmetkârı, gladyatörleri almaya gelecek. O zaman seni arenaya göndereceğim..."
languages.original_text: "No longer will you hide behind the backs of others. When the Haemonculus's servant comes to collect the gladiators, I shall be sending you to the arena.."

traits.locale_text: "Artık başkalarının ardında saklanamayacaksın. Haimonkulus'un hizmetkârı gladyatörleri almaya geldiğinde, seni arenaya göndereceğim..."
